item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, January 27, 2025 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Operation Leg: When the RAF airdropped a prosthetic leg into a German POW castle (28 points | 1 comment)

20. So you wanna write Kubernetes controllers? (196 points | 101 comments)
21. The impact of competition and DeepSeek on Nvidia (356 points | 186 comments)
22. Using the most unhinged AVX-512 instruction to make fastest phrase search algo (191 points | 48 comments)

24. Halliday AR(Not?)/AI Glasses (22 points | 9 comments)
